Key Match Events: Argentina scored their first goal in the 57th minute after halftime adjustments
Maxime Crepeau made several crucial saves, including stopping Messi point-blank
Lautaro Martinez scored the second goal for Argentina in the 89th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Canada's coach Jesse Marsch mentioned Argentina's halftime delay and their improved tactics
Argentina's coach Lionel Scaloni criticized the playing surface and acknowledged it wasn't suitable
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta
The synthetic grass pitch was criticized by Scaloni for not being suitable for top players
